description:
The App Store has become crowded with over 500,000 apps. To stand out in such an ocean of apps, yours has to look unique and the best way to look unique is to have great iPhone App design. Top-selling apps like Evernote, On this Day, Momento, Awesome Note all have design in their DNA.Â 

This course will show you how to take a boring looking app and create a beautiful looking one with a custom design. Take the course and let's get started, it's free!
title: iPhone App Design: How To Make A Top-Selling iPhone App With Great Design
